storyInfo: Conflict breaks out between Rhodes Island and the Sarkaz mercenaries, the sealing layer is activated, members of Rosmontis's squad enter the sealing layer to cut off its power source, and the Shieldguards seek to work with Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: Central District
H—help me...!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: We're Reunion too! Why are you doing this? You Sarkaz always bite whatever hand feeds you!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: ...What's happening?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The Sarkaz barricading the street are massacring Reunion...
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Captain?
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Need to help the casualties.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You are, Captain?
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Mmhm. I'm going.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Ngh... urgh... why, why! !
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: How did Reunion get like this... how did it get like this?! Weren't we gonna unite? Weren't we gonna be... be a family of our own, each other's kin?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: See you—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Heavy-weapons throwers, careful!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Giant, floating weapons...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Was that you, Feline? You did that? You're—a Caster?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Put your weapons down.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's okay now. Go.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Go... go where? We've already... my teammates, my old friends, they all... they all...
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Qing, help him.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Got it. Come here, brother. Those Sarkaz just don't see.
attributes.name: Qing

attributes.content: I'll say it again, Sarkaz. Put your weapons down.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You think we'll stop resisting just because you're holding a weapon.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We don't think that way.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Then you want to be killed?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We don't have much of a choice.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Attacking your own comrades, hurting your own kin—
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: When were the Infected ever our kin? Our kin only numbers Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You couldn't have said that when you joined Reunion.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Betraying, harming your family, playing other people's feelings...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Disgusting.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Watch out for those weapons! Move!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Rosmontis, stop...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, Amiya.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Raidian just sent it out—the last message Dr. Kal'tsit gave us was that we should take care around the special Infected...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They're likely a variant of the special Infected from Lungmen, and we don't know if they'll infect others in progression!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sarkaz warriors, listen to me!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There are some... Sarkaz with a deep infection, and they're catalyzing the other Infected!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We need the other Infected to withdraw from their current areas... Your block still has Infected survivors apart from you, and they're all non-combatants!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if we won't pass through here, I still hope we can all lend a hand to ensuring the safety of those Infected!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's impossible. They wouldn't do that. They have no conscience.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We... we've seen it. We went out on our own.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We can't pull back. If they come this way... we'll have to get rid of them. We can't let even more Sarkaz get infected.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You might get infected yourself.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Who gives a damn.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You want to end up like them too? Those monsters controlled by Arts? You don't give a damn if you do?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Not the first time we've been made out to be monsters, is it?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: ...Oh, um... ah.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: This city's toast. Sooner or later, sure, we might end up like them. But if we can exterminate them, then everything gets a little easier. Some people can still live on.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: As long as Talulah isn't dead, this city will be annihilated.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If W can't kill her, there's no chance you can.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If you don't stand with the winner, you can't win; in war, if you can't win, you die.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: But if you keep hurting any more Infected, then this might be where you die.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: And what if I die, then? What if I turn into one of Mephisto's Herd, huh...?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Mephisto's a monster, too. We kill other Infected because we're all monsters.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: All we want is for the Sarkaz not to suffer any further, but when you think about it, what if we suffer?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: When you leave here and go whatever, will they look you in the eye?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Do you not know your end, being an Infected?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Of course you know. The moment you leave that tiny little squad of yours, you'll die.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You'll be despised, wrung by the neck, lashed, whipped, and hung.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Or you'll be driven out of the cities, run vagrant, and you'll starve, bitten to death by the beasts.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You can't live on.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: And you have no dignity.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: ...What do you know?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Warrior...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Tell me. That you're not fighting for Talulah.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's... strong. With her, the chance that more people live on is better.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We don't care if we kill a few more for it.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Get lost. Next time, I'll cut you in half.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Feline. If you want to pass through here, then just kill us...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: We sure don't want to see our own end up that way. That's if you can kill us, though. Hahah.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You really are the most unsalvageable people.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What...? What?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What was... that sound?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Oh, no...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The block we're in is nearing the ones the command tower closes off its entrances with... Reunion is likely trying to raise the entire sealing layer to cover any way in!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're almost out of time!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sarkaz. I'll give you one last chance. If you don't want to get mangled, pull out.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Heh. Hahah.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Amiya.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'll settle this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Cautus. Hah. What do you think you can do?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Black lines...? That's—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: *Pant*... *pant*. Ugh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's the... state of things?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've suppressed all consciousless Sarkaz mercenaries.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: O—okay, that's good, ngh... Are there other Infected.. here?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have news, but I can't say whether it's good or bad. Recon operators looked around a little. There are, all over this block. And most of them... are in terrible shape. They must've been passive Infected, imprisoned in concentration.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Any passage through the... sealing... layer?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah, this part leads to an engineering passage. Should be able to directly enter the structural control area, hack their remote panels. They can't do a thing about that.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Otherwise, for the open passages, recon ops have sighted at least four battlegrounds, all of them guerrillas against other Reunion...
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: The combat situation seems intense...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The guerrillas are strong, but the Talulah-aligned Reunion have the terrain advantage, and Sarkaz mercenaries backing them. They won't be able to push through for a while.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: It's okay, Amiya. Captain, us engineers will sneak our way in. We'll cut the energy supply to the whole sealing layer.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Can you do it?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Definitely.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: That's too risky.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Entering the core city was risky in the first place.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: No objections, then?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We're going.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: The, um... the, um!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Take care. Mm-hm... take care.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We're not elite operator Rosmontis's squad for nothing. Don't you worry about a thing!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: ...Put your own safety first.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If you wanted us to listen, you wouldn't have used those Arts just now!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Engineering group, move out! Hustle your bustles!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: ...They're gone.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Oh. Amiya. You shouldn't use up your strength here. Let me handle all that.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...This way, you'll be able to do less harm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Does Rhodes Island not want me to do things this way?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That's not it. It's just... if we could, we obviously don't want things done this way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And the only thing I've used up is strength. What you use up is... your awareness.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't really care.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But... we should care.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya! This fellow wants a few words with you.
attributes.name: Qing

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...You're from Reunion, Infected friend. Can I call you that?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whatever. Just... whatever. We're all... done for. I wanted to ask where you're gonna go.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: And if... we can go with you, maybe. We've got nowhere to really go. The Sarkaz'll kill us, and we don't want to fight our own people anymore. The guerrillas'll kill us for sure, too.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Why do you feel that way?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They'd kill anyone if they wanted, wouldn't they? I've heard there's times they say they'll kill the Infected, just because someone did something or other wrong!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: ...I'm not sure. They might do that, but they might not.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My belief is, you have to see how they truly are to reach the facts. You can't just go on hearsay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we won't force you off to where they are. You're afraid of them, and the things they're doing don't sit well with you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And that's why I wanted to... to ask where you're all going.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: —We're heading for the core command tower.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Are you insane?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We want to put a stop to this turmoil, so we have to head for the command tower.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Can I ask you for a favor, Infected friend?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If it's killing—then—then no.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: It's not. I'm hoping you can all... safeguard the bystander Infected on this block.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Be careful. They might not like you... they might not like your uniforms.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then what do we do?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I think you have two options. One is, take off that uniform, and be Reunion no longer...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And the other is, wear your uniforms, but do what you should do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: One option is easy, and one's very hard, but I believe... this is something you should choose for yourselves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Command tower entrance
Curs! The cowards! They're blocking off the tower entrances with the sealing layers!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Have we still not breached them?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The Sarkaz mercenaries are entrenching every sealing sector's in-roads! Other Infected have constantly been harassing us! We can't concentrate our attention!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You, repeat. You're asking us and Rhodes Island to cooperate?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I am!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: If Rhodes Island is unworthy of your trust, then you don't need to think about any of this city's people for a second more.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Even if the rules are going out of style, they'll still play by them.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Even if they still owe the Captain their lives?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If we all die here, who'll carry on Patriot's spirit?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: We have strength, and Rhodes Island has knowledge. At the last, Kal'tsit's incredible on both counts. I personally think she's on par with the Captain. And you saw, even the Captain gave her his recognition!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: The sealing layer's still rising! You'd better decide, because we don't have much time left!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: That's more or less the shape of things. I've already told them about things, so, Amiya...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I'm not asking you to agree to this. I'm just thinking it might be good for us, right?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: It'll lead to a little less wounded all around...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...I'm not really on top of things. I just...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: It's alright, Guard. Your proposal is reasonable. It's just that we... we won't do things the same way the Shieldguards do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We don't have any right to exercise over the Infected, and we won't adopt their... disciplinary methods.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are they almost here?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Should be.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...Amiya, I'm making less and less sense of anything.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: —Feline. I'm looking for your leader.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: If you want revenge, is now a good time?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Don't think you can try pissing me off just because you know a bit of Arts, white cat!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I don't like you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Am I making you realize? The way you do things, you're no merchant's underling, eh? You're more like some Infected warrior hero, aren't you?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Guerrilla fighter.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You can't threaten our employees. You don't have the authority.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...The Lord.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Can you command those Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...I can't, and I couldn't. Please don't call me that. All I am is a member of Rhodes Island. Nothing to do with race, nor any arbitrary form of power.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then that makes things simple, if you and them have absolutely no blood affinity.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: You're going to team up with us here? Wreck the command tower together?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: What're you so on guard for? We're obviously the ones yielding here.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The other guerrillas still don't know what I'm up to, but I have faith you feel the same way as them. This city's people are enslaved by Talulah and her wicked plans, and you too want to liberate them.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: We want to revive hope for the Infected, so let's light one more flame for this city!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: if you truly fight for the Infected, then you're sure to agree.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Now answer, Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Shieldguard
